scripts.watch: ls -d test/* lib/* lib/**/* | grep -v 'node_modules' | grep .es6 | xargs ./node_modules/.bin/babel -d ./ -w
scripts.lint-staged: git diff --diff-filter=ACMRTUXB --cached --name-only | grep -v 'tests' | grep -v 'README.md' | xargs eslint -c .eslintrc
scripts.doctoc: doctoc README.md --title '**Ember-CLI Seeds Scaffold**' && if [ -f CONTRIBUTING.md ]; then doctoc CONTRIBUTING.md; fi && if [[ $(git diff --shortstat -- README.md 2> /dev/null | tail -n1) != '' || $(git diff --shortstat -- CONTRIBUTING.md 2> /dev/null | tail -n1) != '' ]]; then git add README.md CONTRIBUTING.md && git commit --no-verify -m'table of contents update'; fi
scripts.dmn: dmn gen -f . && if [[ $(git diff --shortstat 2> /dev/null | tail -n1) != '' ]]; then git add .npmignore && git commit --no-verify -m'update npmignore'; fi
scripts.build: ls -d test/* lib/* lib/**/* | grep -v 'node_modules' | grep .es6 | xargs ./node_modules/.bin/babel -d ./
scripts.release: f () { source ./scripts.sh && npm run requireGitClean && npm run gitPull && npm run dmn && npm run doctoc && npm_release public $@; }; f

config.notes: important to correct the path of npm so that the git hook doesn't error

ghooks.pre-push: PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin:/usr/local/sbin && npm run dmn && npm run doctoc
